snippet: AT&T plans to announce on Tuesday a way for customers to upgrade phones sooner. T-Mobile unveiled a similar option last week.
abstract: AT&T plans to announce plan that gives customers chance to upgrade phones after one year one week after T-Mobile USA announced similar option; move underscores one of biggest problems in smartphone industry: fewer people are upgrading year after year; analysts say that could be because phones have been hitting a wall in terms of what they can do.
lead_paragraph: AT&T plans to announce on Tuesday a way for customers to upgrade phones sooner. T-Mobile unveiled a similar option last week.

headline.main: 2 New Plans to Upgrade Smartphones After a Year
headline.print_headline: 2 New Plans To Upgrade Smartphones After a Year
